-- :OBJ,

-- FILE_PATH

Options:
'0' = Not Present,
'1' =  KeyBoard,
'2' =  RaspberryPi,
'3' =  EbbSimulator,
'4' = EbbConnector

0=Debug,

The default parking currency
The minimum decimal precision to be guaranted for amounts.
Enable/Disable Local Validation
Shows/Hides IP On Door Opened
Maximum parking time without charge
Maximum payment to exit time without further charge
Amount/minute used as simple tariffs computation fallback.

0 -> 'No Lost',
1 -> 'Lost On Off Line',
2 -> 'Lost Always'
The time of the current day used as start time for lost price computation

The default tax percentage applyed to the parking price

Cash snapshots printing mode:
0=Disabled,
1=Delta Only If Any,
2=Always All.

0=Disabled,
1=Pos Only,
2=Always All.

Shows/Hides the 'max deliverable change' during a payment

1=On Pre Pay,
2=On Armed Pay.
